Parameters.Name: ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response with one token
Test.Description: Check ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY test when DUT returns correct response with one AccessPoint token

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response with more then one token
Test.Description: Check ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY test when DUT returns correct response with more than one AccessPoint token

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response when one AccessPointInfo contains no AreaTo and AreaFrom
Test.Description: Check ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY test when DUT returns correct response with AccessPointInfo which contains no AreaTo and AreaFrom

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response when one AccessPointInfo contains no AreaTo
Test.Description: Check ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY test when DUT returns correct response with AccessPointInfo which contains no AreaTo

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response when one AccessPointInfo contains no AreaFrom
Test.Description: Check ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY test when DUT returns correct response with AccessPointInfo which contains no AreaFrom

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Wrong response with no AccessPoint
Test.Description: Check ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY test when DUT returns correct response with no AccessPoint tokens

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response (MaxLimit=number of AccessPoint, MaxLimit=number of Area)
Test.Description: Check ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY test MaxLimit=number of AccessPoint, MaxLimit=number of Area

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response (MaxLimit is less than number of AccessPoint, MaxLimit is less than number of Area)
Test.Description: Check ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY test MaxLimit=number of AccessPoint, MaxLimit=number of Area

Test.TestName: GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Incorrect response - one value in AreaTo element was not contained in GetAreaInfoList
Test.Description: Check ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY test when DUT returns incorrect response: one value in AreaTo element of GetAccessPointInfoListResponse message was not contained of GetAccessPointInfoListByTokenListResponse message

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Incorrect response - one value in AreaFrom element was not contained in GetAreaInfo
Test.Description: Check ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY test when DUT returns incorrect response: one value in AreaFrom element of GetAccessPointInfoListResponse message was not contained of GetAccessPointInfoListResponse message

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Incorrect response - all values in AreaFrom and AreaTo element was not contained in GetAreaInfoList
Test.Description: Check ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY test when DUT returns incorrect response: all values in AreaFrom and AreaTo element of GetAccessPointInfoListResponse message was not contained of GetAccessPointInfoListtResponse message

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response - AreaFrom and AreaTo are empty
Test.Description: Check ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY test when DUT returns correct response with empty AreaFrom and AreaTo parameters

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response with no AccessPoint
Test.Description: Check ACCESSCONTROL-4-1-1 GET AREA INFO LIST AND GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST CONSISTENCY test when DUT returns no any AccessPoint
